mapper.select: SELECT memKey, subj, studyNum, bookNum, yoil, yoilSeq, bookFlag, visitHours, empKey, deptCD, jisaCD, regDate, regID, updDate, updID FROM globalbiz.MemSubjStudy WHERE memKey = #{memKey} AND subj = #{subj} AND yoilSeq = '1'

SELECT globalbiz.FuncCodeDtlNM(#{jisaCD}, '0206', c.visitHours, '', 'Y') AS visitHoursName, a.deptName, COUNT(1) AS cnt FROM globalbiz.DeptMst AS a INNER JOIN globalbiz.MemSubjMst AS b ON a.jisaCD = b.jisaCD AND a.deptCD = b.deptCD AND b.statusCD = '1' INNER JOIN globalbiz.MemSubjStudy AS c ON b.memKey = c.memKey AND b.subj = c.subj AND c.yoilSeq = '1' WHERE b.yoil = #{yoil} AND c.visitHours = #{time} AND a.jisaCD = #{jisaCD} AND b.subj = CASE #{subj} WHEN 'All' THEN b.subj ELSE #{subj} END GROUP BY a.deptCD
